name: Duplicate it
author: Smartzminds

sections.description:
A clone of a page or post can be made with the help of the duplicate it plugin. Duplicating pages, posts, and custom posts only requires one click and it will save as your selected options (draft, private, public, pending).

The duplicate it plugin makes it incredibly simple to replicate pages or posts, then remove them again!

And why is having multiple pages handy? Just a few of the use cases are as follows:

  • Duplicate pages or posts should be accessible to all user roles.
  • Ability to select the status of duplicate pages or posts.
  • Repeated Page Post Type Links will have their presentation filtered.
  • Potential integration of Post Prefix.
  • The potential to add a suffix.
  • Redirecting is an option that appears when you click the clone URL.
  • By clicking the duplicate link under the title of the post or page in “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages,” you can quickly create a copy of it and go back to the list.
  • To duplicate many items at once, select “Duplicate” from the “Bulk Actions” dropdown menu after selecting one or more of the items in “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages”.
  • In “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages,” you can change the counter value. To make copies based on the counter value, choose “Duplicate” in the edit row sections.

How to use it

Two-minute video tutorial and you are ready to use it, that’s how simple Duplicate page and post plugin works!

After installation you’ll see a Duplicate page and post plugin option in your dashboard menu, which allows various options:

  • Activating the plugin is the first step.
  • Create a new page or post, or use an already-existing page that you wish to duplicate.
  • Depending on the settings, a new page or post will be created when you click the “Duplicate” link and saved as a draft, publish, pending, or private document.
  • By clicking the Apply button after choosing the copy All link under the bulk options, you can quickly decide which pages or posts to copy. Subsequently, duplicate entries will be generated according to the selected posts or pages.

  • Changing the number of copies and selecting which posts or pages to duplicate with a counter value may also be done by clicking on the duplicate option in the row edit sections. After then, copies will be made using the updated consultant value.

  • Additionally, you can leave reviews and provide feedback. The ability to do so is displayed as a notification on your dashboard or when you install the plugin.

Minimum requirements for Duplicate Page

  • WordPress 3.3+
  • PHP 5.x
  • MySQL 5.x

If any problem occurs, please contact us at support@smartzminds.com.
sections.faq:
How do I duplicate a post or page?

Simply click the “Duplicate” link under the title in the “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages” screen, and a copy will be created according to your selected options.

Can I duplicate multiple posts or pages at once?

Yes, you can select multiple items in the “Edit Posts” or “Edit Pages” screen, then choose “Duplicate” from the “Bulk Actions” dropdown menu.

What happens after I duplicate a page or post?

The duplicated item will be saved as a draft, published, private, or pending, depending on your settings.

Is it possible to add a prefix or suffix to duplicated pages or posts?

Yes, the plugin offers options to add a prefix or suffix to the duplicated items.

Can all user roles duplicate pages or posts?

Yes, the plugin allows duplicate functionality to be accessible to all user roles.

short_description: The ability to clone pages and posts makes Duplicate It is a fantastic tool. With just one click now, it's possible.
